body_html:
Now, I'm getting this error when I try to build the pip package. If I recall correctly, I believe I encountered a similar problem before, when trying to build from source, but was able to build on a subsequent attempt. However, I don't remember doing anything differently.

ERROR: /home/david/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/grappler/BUILD:61:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core/grappler:graph_view' failed (Exit 1)
tensorflow/core/grappler/graph_view.cc: In constructor 'tensorflow::grappler::GraphView::GraphView(tensorflow::GraphDef*)':
tensorflow/core/grappler/graph_view.cc:22:1: internal compiler error: Segmentation fault
GraphView::GraphView(GraphDef* graph) : graph_(graph) {
^~~~~~~~~

body:
Now, I'm getting this error when I try to build the pip package.  If I recall correctly, I  believe I encountered a similar problem before, when trying to build from source, but  was able to build on a subsequent attempt.  However, I don't remember doing anything differently.

ERROR: /home/david/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/grappler/BUILD:61:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core/grappler:graph_view' failed (Exit 1)
tensorflow/core/grappler/graph_view.cc: In constructor 'tensorflow::grappler::GraphView::GraphView(tensorflow::GraphDef*)':
tensorflow/core/grappler/graph_view.cc:22:1: internal compiler error: Segmentation fault
 GraphView::GraphView(GraphDef* graph) : graph_(graph) {
 ^~~~~~~~~
